ComicInfo.Summary: Jackie is back in the US, but he's no longer the wielder of the The Darkness. In order to regain his status, he is working in some decent jobs like gunrunning. While slaughtering a local gang, Jackie was interrupted by Aphrodite IV, who was last seen testing her abilities against Sara Pezzini in New York.Without the powers of the Darkness, what chances does Jackie has against this gorgeous assassin? And maybe more important, what is the organization she works for planning to do with Estacado?
ComicInfo.Title: Crooked, Part 1
